text:
Hi, I am trying to create a website page in HubSpot.
I want to keep a slider module that can be edited by the admin to update it when required.
I cloned the HubSpot slider module and just added a drag and drop option for an extra image in that.
When I saved the new module and inserted it in the website page, I only get a placeholder box and no saved changes are visible/published there. Can anyone help with this please?
